locations.name: Istanbul
locations.description: The tour begins in this vibrant metropolis spanning Europe and Asia, known for iconic sites like Hagia Sophia, the Blue Mosque, and the Grand Bazaar.

locations.name: Göreme (Cappadocia)
locations.description: Located in the heart of Cappadocia, this area is the base for exploring surreal landscapes, fairy chimneys, cave dwellings, and experiencing hot air balloon rides. Göreme is a central town often used as a base.

locations.name: Bodrum
locations.description: The final stop is this glamorous Aegean coastal town, offering relaxation by the sea, historical exploration (Mausoleum at Halicarnassus), and charming white-washed architecture.
